thread.title_full: good, but still details missing - Review of W Paris - Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Deflumine
title: good, but still details missing
text:
This is a very good hotel, no doubt
rooms are small (this is Paris) but extremely comfortable.
Florian and his restaurant team did a fantastic job making my meeting easy and trouble free
However, one can see some of the staff are still set in "old" ways, in contradiction with spirit of W
One morning I was told I was "lucky" they still had 2 english breakfast teabags...and indeed, next day I was told no more english breakfast tea...I think they charge over 30â‚¬ for a breakfast
When asking about checkout at the concierge desk, I was told I had to ask same question to the receptionist, who was in direct eyecontact and a mere 2 m away, When I asked if I actually had to move myself 2 meters to ask same question, I was told yes, indeed. as if 2 desks cannot have same computerprogram run on them, and how procedures and habits go against total guest comfort....
Room Tip: smallest rooms are very small indeed but rather pricy See more room tips Green Features: standard stuff - change towels or not with Unicef branded card
